segments.text: I see a scene that should be filled with warmth, yet it’s filled with tension instead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, lost in her task, while chaos begins to reign behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a sense of urgency as I watch the water pour from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her oblivion is mind-boggling; how can she not notice what’s happening?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the boy—he’s daring fate, climbing and grasping for those cookies like a little acrobat!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Watching him reach higher makes my stomach churn; one misstep and it’s all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s eager posture is so innocent, yet she’s partaking in this risky venture, too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t understand why they’re willing to take such chances, it’s just a cookie after all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight from the window seems so misplaced in this moment of impending chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just wish someone would notice, before it becomes too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
